name: Variety Arborist
desc: Plant 1 of each common tree (oak, spruce, birch).

name: Diverse Reforester
desc: Plant 100 of each common tree (oak, spruce, birch).

name: Arboreal Alchemist
desc: Plant 1,000 of each common tree (oak, spruce, birch).

name: Conifer Collector
desc: Plant 1 of each coniferous tree (pine, fir, cedar).

name: Conifer Conservator
desc: Plant 100 of each coniferous tree (pine, fir, cedar).

name: Evergreen Emissary
desc: Plant 1,000 of each coniferous tree (pine, fir, cedar).

name: Leafy Liberator
desc: Plant 1 of each deciduous tree (maple, willow, poplar).

name: Deciduous Dynamo
desc: Plant 100 of each deciduous tree (maple, willow, poplar).

name: Foliage Fulminator
desc: Plant 1,000 of each deciduous tree (maple, willow, poplar).

name: Ashen Adventurer
desc: Unlock and plant the rare and almighty ash tree.

name: Ashen Apprentice
desc: Plant 100 of the rare and almighty ash tree.

name: Ashen Ascender
desc: Plant 1,000 of the rare and almighty ash tree.
